article.title: Welcome to the Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

​The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is the lead federal agency to help promote and develop U.S. exports. Our goal is to help U.S. based businesses develop and expand their revenue streams from potential foreign markets. The U.S. Commercial Service is dedicated to assisting small-to-medium sized companies that have the capabilities to export a product and or service. Our experienced staff located at the U.S. Export Assistance Center is here to serve this highly diverse and multi-cultural trade community in Hawaii and the U.S. Pacific Territories Islands. Our International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • Identify and evaluate international partners
  • Create market entry strategies
  • Navigate international documentation challenges
  • Understand other export related issues

The Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center is part of an international network of global professionals. We have offices in over 100 cities across the United States and 165 commercial offices in 82 countries throughout the world.

Hawaii is a globally recognized brand which helps to make its products and services attractive to buyers throughout the world. Our office has assisted companies across the islands sell a range of products and services in foreign markets. We also support companies based on Guam, American Samoa, and the Northern Mariana Islands.

For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the international marketplace, please visitOur Servicespage orContact Us. ​

article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center.
